activities: ShopKeep.com Inc. provides Point of Sale software solutions to merchants to provide services for, among other things, sales register actions, record keeping and inventory. As such, Shopkeep receives certain basic information about merchants and their customers such as the merchant and customer name and certain contact information. That information may be transferred from the EU/EEA to the United States.
personaldata: ShopKeep.com Inc. provides Point of Sale software solutions to merchants to provide services for, among other things, sales register actions, record keeping and inventory. As such, Shopkeep receives certain basic information about merchants and their customers such as the merchant and customer name and certain contact information. That information may be transferred from the EU/EEA to the U.S.
recoursemech: ShopKeep.com is registered with JAMS as its independent recourse mechanism for investigating unresolved complaints concerning its compliance with Safe Harbor Framework(s).
